page.title: 03NEW HOUSING IN BREAN
page.content: ONE OF THE NEW HOUSING ESTATES IN BREAN,IS A MIXTURE OF HOUSES AND BUNGALOWS.IT IS A FAIRLY BIG ESTATE WITH FOUR CLOSES,PINE WOOD WAY,WESLEY CLOSE AND HUETT CLOSE.MOST OF THE HOUSES AND BUNGALOWS ARE SIX TO SEVEN YEARS OLD.WE TALKED TO A FEW PEOPLE AND ASKED THEM QUESTIONS ABOUT HOW THEY LIKE THE AREA THEY LIVE IN.WE ASKED THEM IF IT'S SAFE FOR LITTLE CHILDREN TO PLAY BECAUSE OF THE ROADS,MOST OF THE PEOPLE WE TALKED TO SAID THE ROADS WERE VERY BAD AND ALSO THERE ARE NOT ENOUGH FOOTPATHS.THEY WANTED SOMETHING DONE ABOUT IT,BECAUSE IT IS DANGEROUS FOR LITTLE CHILDREN AND OLDER PEOPLE. PUBLIC TRANSPORT AND BUSES IN THAT AREA IS BAD,THERE IS NOT MUCH ENTERTAINMENT FOR YOUNGER PEOPLE AROUND THAT AREA IT'S MOSTLY ON BURNHAM.
